All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbilityAlreadyUsedException
This exception is created by the server when the current player tries to use a Character Card even if he has already used it
ActionSceneController
This class controls the FXML file of the action scene.
AlreadyUsedCardException
This exception is created by the server when the current player tries to use an assistant card which was already played in this turn
ANSI
 
App
This class is the main application, it asks the user whether he wants to join as a client or to run a server, then it runs the correspondent main class
AssistantCard
 
Bag
 
BasicGame
This class represents the current state of a Basic Mode game, and handles players' move

Character8
 
Character9
 
CharacterInfoController
Displays the detailed description of the characters' abilities.
ChooseCloudEvent
 
Client
 
ClientDisconnectedEvent
Handles resilience, when the socket reader finds out that a client is no longer connected, this event is launched directly to the controller.
CliView
Displays the command line interface and sends to the server the events raised by the players.
Cloud
 
CloudAlreadyChosenException
This exception is created by the server when the current player tries to select an empty cloud
COLOR
 
ConcreteExpertGame
This class decorates BasicGame with the functionalities of the expert mode (including characters and coins)
Constants
 
Controller
This class handles the requests from the client and modifies the model.
Deck
 
DrawAssistantCardEvent
 
EndSceneController
Last scene, won or lost.
ExpertGameDecorator
 
Game
 
GameEvent
The events encapsulate the messages that are sent between server and clients.
GameHandler
This class is a singleton that handles the raise of events
GameMode2
This class extends the ConcreteExpertGame and changes the rules of the turn when the character 2 is called.
GameMode6
This class extends the ConcreteExpertGame and changes the rules of the turn when the character 6 is called.
GameMode8
This class extends the ConcreteExpertGame and changes the rules of the turn when the character 8 is called.
GameMode9
This class extends the ConcreteExpertGame and changes the rules of the turn when the character 9 is called.
GameSettingsController
Only for the first player, that has to decide the game mode and the number of players.
GuiController
This class contains various common methods to allocate images and make actions.
GuiManager
This class manages the transitions of GUI scenes
GuiView
This is a JavaFX Application class that creates a new stage with the first scene
InvalidCharacterException
This exception is created by the server when the current player tries to use a Character card which is not present in the group of the three selected Characters
InvalidCharIslandIndexException
This exception is created by the server when the current player tries to, using Character3 ability, select an island which does not exist
InvalidIslandIndexException
This exception is created by the server when the current player tries to select an island which does not exist
InvalidNumStudentsException
This exception is created by the server when the current player select an odd number of students to move using Character 10 ability
InvalidPhaseException
This exception is created by the server when it receives a move that couldn't be made during the current phase This is an anomaly
InvalidPlayerIndexException
 
InvalidStepsException
This exception is created by the server when the current player tries to move Mather Nature more than what its chosen assistant card allows him to do, or by a negative number
InvalidUserNameException
This exception is created by the server when the current player tries to use a username which was already chosen by another player
Island
 
MoveMotherEvent
 
MoveStudentToDiningEvent
 
MoveStudentToIslandEvent
 
NewPlayerCreatedEvent
 
NickNameRequestController
Every client nis required to insert a nickname to enter a game.
NoMoreSpaceException
This exception is created by the server when the current player tries to add another student to a full dining room
NotAvailableCardException
This exception is created by the server when the current player tries to choose an Assistant card which is not in his deck
NotifyExceptionEvent
 
PlanningController
This class controls the FXML file where the players select the assistant cards (planning phase).
Player
 
PlayerAccessEvent
 
Professor
 
RemoteView
Represents the client in the server side of the architecture.
RequestNumPlayersEvent
 
SchoolBoard
 
SelectedGameSetUpEvent
 
Server
 
SocketReader<T>
This class has the function of creating an input queue for the events received by the socket.
SocketWriter<T>
This class has the function of creating an output queue for the events about to be sent by the socket.
STATUS
 
StatusGame
Defines the order of the game
Student
 
StudentNotPresentException
This exception is created by the server when the current player tries to move a student from his entrance to his dining room, but a student of the chosen color is not present in the entrance
StudentNotPresentInCharacterException
 
TEAM
 
TieEvent
 
TooPoorException
This exception is created by the server when the current player tries to use a Character ability even if he does not have enough money
Tower
 
UpdatedDataEvent
 
UseCharacter10Event
 
UseCharacter11Event
 
UseCharacter12Event
 
UseCharacter1Event

UseCharacter7Event
 
UseCharacter8Event
 
UseCharacter9Event
 
VictoryEvent
 
View
This abstract class is the parent of all the view of the game: RemoteView(Server),CliView(Client) and GuiManager(Client).
ViewData
This class contains the current state of the game in the client-side, it is sent from the server to the client in an UpdatedDataEvent
WaitingRoomController
Lobby of the game, displayed when a player needs to wait for other players to connect.
